Name: [].id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: [].collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: [].created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: [].informacion_general
Description:
General information regarding the tax return (year, RFC, return type,
person/company name, and so on).

Name: [].datos_adicionales
Description: Additional data regarding the tax return.

Name: [].estado_resultados
Description:
Detailed information about the legal entity's yearly profit and loss.

> **Note**: For tax returns submitted for the 2022 tax year and later, this field will return null as it is no longer a required field when submitting your tax return.

Name: [].estado_posicion_financiera_balance
Description:
Details regarding balance sheet of the legal entity.

> **Note**: For tax returns submitted for the 2022 tax year and later, this field will return null as it is no longer a required field when submitting your tax return.

Name: [].conciliacion_entre_resultado_contable_fiscal
Description:
Details regarding the accounting reconciliation.

> **Note**: For tax returns submitted for the 2022 tax year and later, this field will return null as it is no longer a required field when submitting your tax return.

Name: [].deducciones_autorizadas
Description: Details regarding the legal entity's deductions.

Name: [].cifras_cierre_ejercicio
Description: Details regarding key numbers at the end of the fiscal exercise.

Name: [].determinacion_del_impuesto_sobre_la_renta
Description: Details regarding the final tax return.

Name: [].ingressos
Description:
> **Note**: Only applicable for tax return filed on or after 2022. For tax returns filed before 2022, this field will return `null`.

Details regarding the total amounts earned in the fiscal year.

Name: [].determinacion
Description:
> **Note**: Only applicable for tax return filed on or after 2022. For tax returns filed before 2022, this field will return `null`.

Details regarding the tax due or tax credit.

Name: [].pdf
Description: Tax return PDF as a binary.

Name: [].receipt_pdf
Description:
The acknowledgement receipt from the fiscal institution confirming that
they received the tax return.
